roleset.name: reflect light well
roleset.note: GLEAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gleam' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 43.1. (from gleam.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: only adjectival
example.text: At the GM stall, they barely looked at a gleaming Cadillac, preferring to talk about cooperation possibilities.
